actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution relative to the liberation of Kuwait.

summary.text: Prohibits the President from lifting U.S. economic sanctions against Saddam Hussein's regime in Iraq, and directs the President to make every effort to ensure that the multinational coalition maintains the full range of economic sanctions, until such regime has released all prisoners of war and has accounted as fully as possible for all those missing in action, including Kuwaitis captured during the Iraqi occupation.

titles.title: A joint resolution relative to the liberation of Kuwait.
